plugin.name: RouterLocator
plugin.description: Meta locator routing location requests of picks and origins to actual locator implementations.

parameter.name: regions

group.name: initial
group.description: Configuration of initial locator used to create an initial solution based on a pick set. If a solution is found, relocate of the actual locator configured in the region file is invoked.

parameter.name: locator
parameter.description: Name of the initial locator interface, e.g., LOCSAT

parameter.name: profile
parameter.description: Profile name of the initial locator, e.g., iasp91
